title: Racepoint Global Appoints Bob Osmond as President, Expanding Agency Leadership
description: BOSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Racepoint Global (RPG), an independent communications agency specializing in driving conversations that matter for innovative brands, today announced the appointment of Bob Osmond as agency president. In this role, Osmond will drive t…
